New Records: Axar Patel scored 65 off 31 and Suryakumar Yadav scored 51 off 36 in a 91-run sixth wicket partnership
Dasun Shanaka scored 56 off 22 and took crucial wickets
Key Match Events: Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav's 91-run partnership
Dasun Shanaka's all-round performance including 56 off 22 and defending 21 runs in the final over
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's bowlers performed well to defend their total
